sentences.cn: 英国的公立学校已经落伍过时了.

sentences.en: In remembering historic events, the mistake you tend to make is anachronistic.
sentences.cn: 在记历史事件时，你容易犯的错误是时代错误。

sentences.en: Many of its practices seem anachronistic.
sentences.cn: 它的很多做法似乎过时了。

sentences.en: Opponents of wigs thought they were anachronistic, as well as uncomfortable and expensive.
sentences.cn: 反对佩戴假发者认为假发已过时 、 戴着不舒适而且价格昂贵.

sentences.en: Those days are becoming as anachronistic as the sokaiya.
sentences.cn: 像总会屋一样,这些日子将成为时代错误.

words.tran_cn: 时代错误；不合潮流的人或物

trans.tran_en: You say that something is anachronistic when you think that it is out of date or old-fashioned
